You can also email us directly at info@banded.com. Our team is happy to help!

1800PetSupplies.com: Did you see something you liked? Take a second look! https://1800ps.attn.tv/a1Ae-GqetgXZ 

Can I help find something specific today?
What is checkout +???
1800PetSupplies.com: For questions not related to our products or services, please contact our customer support via call or email.
At checkout you charge an additional fee called checkout+, what is that as it don't look like a shipping or it taxes?

1800PetSupplies.com: Good question! Checkout+ is an optional add-on available at checkout that offers additional benefits, such as shipping protection and an easier returns process.

You can choose to add Checkout+ to your order for extra peace of mind, or you can proceed with standard checkout without it. Hope this helps! If you have any questions, feel free to text me.

escalate: When ESC write in the note "the escalation is for 1800PetSupplies"
